name: Magic Sisters II: A Family Affair
name_original: Magic Sisters II: A Family Affair
description: Tara, Bubbles, and Blaze are back for three new mysteries. This time each girl is on her own to solve three unique mysteries in the dark lands of the North. Witches, Vampires, Fairies, and much more inhabit the desolate land. Do you have what it takes to solve all three mysteries? Find out in Magic Sisters II: A Family Affair
